mapper.insert: insert into fy_user (create_date, modify_date, type_id, member_type, random_num, username, real_name, password, email, is_enabled, is_lock, login_failure_count, status, real_status, phone_status, scene_status, add_ip, last_time, last_ip, login_time, auto_tender_rate_end, auto_tender_reward_end, auto_tender_limit_end, auto_tender_date, auto_tender_modify_date, tg_no, tg_one_level_user_id, source_from ,phone ) values (#{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{typeId}, #{memberType}, #{randomNum}, #{username}, #{realName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{isEnabled}, #{isLock}, 0, #{status}, #{realStatus}, 1, #{sceneStatus}, #{addIp}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastIp}, #{loginTime}, 100, 100, 3, now(), now(), #{tgNo}, #{tgOneLevelUserId}, #{sourceFrom} ,#{phone} );
mapper.update: update fy_user set modify_date=now(), login_failure_count=#{loginFailureCount}, is_lock=#{isLock}, tg_no = #{tgNo}, tg_one_level_user_id = #{tgOneLevelUserId}, tg_status = #{tgStatus}, sum_tender_money = #{sumTenderMoney}, phone = #{phone}, phone_status = #{phoneStatus}, locked_date=#{lockedDate} where id=#{id}
